Michigan Ongoing Health & Safety Training Refresher 2023
Section 3: Prevention & Control of Infectious Disease (Including Immunizations)

Exception For Children Experiencing Homelessness

Card Title 3

A recent additional section to this Rule protects Child Care Centers from being cited If they are unable to produce health and immunization records for children that are homeless.
